verses.verse: And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>: Gather yourselves together <S%H622><s%>, that I may tell <S%H5046><s%> you that which shall befall <S%H7122><s%> you in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
Assemble yourselves <S%H6908><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%>, ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; And hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>.

Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, thou art my first-born <S%H1060><s%>, my might <S%H3581><s%>, and the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of my strength <S%H202><s%>; The pre-eminence <S%H3499><s%> of dignity <S%H7613><s%>, and the pre-eminence <S%H3499><s%> of power <S%H5794><s%>.

Boiling <S%H6349><s%> over as water <S%H4325><s%>, thou shalt not have the pre-eminence <S%H3498><s%>; Because thou wentest up <S%H5927><s%> to thy father <S%H1><s%>'s bed <S%H4904><s%>; Then defiledst thou <S%H2490><s%> it <S%H5927><s%>: he went up to my couch <S%H3326><s%>.
Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%> are brethren <S%H251><s%>; Weapons <S%H3627><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%> are their swords <S%H4380><s%>.

O my soul <S%H5315><s%>, come <S%H935><s%> not thou into their council <S%H5475><s%>; Unto their assembly <S%H6951><s%>, my glory <S%H3519><s%>, be not thou united <S%H3161><s%>; For in their anger <S%H639><s%> they slew <S%H2026><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>, And in their self-will <S%H7522><s%> they hocked <S%H6131><s%> an ox <S%H7794><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be their anger <S%H639><s%>, for it was fierce <S%H5794><s%>; And their wrath <S%H5678><s%>, for it was cruel <S%H7185><s%>: I will divide <S%H2505><s%> them in Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, And scatter <S%H6327><s%> them in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Judah <S%H3063><s%>, thee shall thy brethren <S%H251><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%>: Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be on the neck <S%H6203><s%> of thine enemies <S%H341><s%>; Thy father <S%H1><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> shall bow down before thee <S%H7812><s%>.

Judah <S%H3063><s%> is a lion <S%H738><s%>'s whelp <S%H1482><s%>; From the prey <S%H2964><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>, thou art gone up <S%H5927><s%>: He stooped down <S%H3766><s%>, he couched <S%H7257><s%> as a lion <S%H3833><s%>, And as a lioness <S%H3833><s%>; who shall rouse him up <S%H6965><s%>?

The sceptre <S%H7626><s%> shall not depart <S%H5493><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Nor the ruler <S%H2710><s%>'s staff from between his feet <S%H7272><s%>, Until <S%H3588><s%> Shiloh <S%H7886><s%> come <S%H935><s%>; And unto him shall the obedience <S%H3349><s%> of the peoples be <S%H5971><s%>.

Binding <S%H631><s%> his foal <S%H5895><s%> unto the vine <S%H1612><s%>, And his ass <S%H860><s%>'s colt <S%H1121><s%> unto the choice vine <S%H8321><s%>; He hath washed <S%H3526><s%> his garments <S%H3830><s%> in wine <S%H3196><s%>, And his vesture <S%H5497><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of grapes <S%H6025><s%>:
His eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall be red <S%H2447><s%> with wine <S%H3196><s%>, And his teeth <S%H8127><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%>.

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> at the haven <S%H2348><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>; And he shall be for a haven <S%H2348><s%> of ships <S%H591><s%>; And his border <S%H3411><s%> shall be upon Sidon <S%H6721><s%>.
Issachar <S%H3485><s%> is a strong <S%H1634><s%> ass <S%H2543><s%>, Couching down <S%H7257><s%> between the sheepfolds <S%H4942><s%>:

And he saw <S%H7200><s%> a resting-place <S%H4496><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>, And the land <S%H776><s%> that it was pleasant <S%H5276><s%>; And he bowed <S%H5186><s%> his shoulder <S%H7926><s%> to bear <S%H5445><s%>, And became a servant <S%H5647><s%> under taskwork <S%H4522><s%>.
Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall judge <S%H1777><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, As one <S%H259><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be a serpent <S%H5175><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, An adder <S%H8207><s%> in the path <S%H734><s%>, That biteth <S%H5391><s%> the horse <S%H5483><s%>'s heels <S%H6119><s%>, So that his rider <S%H7392><s%> falleth <S%H5307><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>.
I have waited for <S%H6960><s%> thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Gad <S%H1410><s%>, a troop <S%H1416><s%> shall press <S%H1464><s%> upon him <S%H1464><s%>; But he shall press upon their heel <S%H6119><s%>.
Out of Asher <S%H836><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> shall be fat <S%H8082><s%>, And he shall yield <S%H5414><s%> royal <S%H4428><s%> dainties <S%H4574><s%>.
Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> is a hind <S%H355><s%> let loose <S%H7971><s%>: He giveth <S%H5414><s%> goodly <S%H8233><s%> words <S%H561><s%>.

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> bough <S%H1121><s%>, A fruitful <S%H6509><s%> bough <S%H1121><s%> by a fountain <S%H5869><s%>; His branches <S%H1323><s%> run <S%H6805><s%> over the wall <S%H7791><s%>.
The archers <S%H1167><s%> have sorely grieved him <S%H4843><s%>, And shot <S%H7232><s%> at him <S%H7852><s%>, and persecuted him:

But his bow <S%H7198><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> in strength <S%H386><s%>, And the arms <S%H2220><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> were made strong <S%H6339><s%>, By the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Mighty <S%H46><s%> One of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> (From thence is the shepherd <S%H7462><s%>, the stone <S%H68><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>),

Even by the God <S%H410><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, who shall help <S%H5826><s%> thee <S%H854><s%>, And by the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, who shall bless <S%H1288><s%> thee <S%H1293><s%>, With blessings of heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H5920><s%>, Blessings <S%H1293><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> that coucheth <S%H7257><s%> beneath <S%H1293><s%>, Blessings of the breasts <S%H7699><s%>, and of the womb <S%H7356><s%>.

The blessings <S%H1293><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%> Have prevailed <S%H1396><s%> above the blessings <S%H1293><s%> of my progenitors <S%H2029><s%> Unto the utmost bound <S%H8379><s%> of the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> hills <S%H1389><s%>: They shall be on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, And on the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%> of him that was separate <S%H5139><s%> from his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> is a wolf <S%H2061><s%> that raveneth <S%H2963><s%>: In the morning <S%H1242><s%> he shall devour <S%H398><s%> the prey <S%H5706><s%>, And at even <S%H6153><s%> he shall divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>.

All these are the twelve <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and this is it that their father <S%H1><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto them and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them <S%H834><s%>; every one <S%H376><s%> according to his blessing <S%H1293><s%> he blessed them <S%H1288><s%>.

And he charged <S%H6680><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, and said unto them <S%H622><s%>, I am to be gathered unto my people <S%H5971><s%>: bury <S%H6912><s%> me with my fathers <S%H1><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>,

in the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, which is before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, which Abraham <S%H85><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> with the field <S%H7704><s%> from Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a burying-place <S%H6913><s%>.

There they buried <S%H6912><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>; there they buried <S%H6912><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>; and there I buried <S%H6912><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%>â€”
the field <S%H7704><s%> and the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is therein <S%H4735><s%>, which was purchased from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>.

And when Jacob <S%H3290><s%> made an end <S%H3615><s%> of charging <S%H6680><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, he gathered up <S%H622><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> into the bed <S%H4296><s%>, and yielded up the ghost <S%H1478><s%>, and was gathered <S%H622><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>.
